handist.mpijunit

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.mpijunit.Notification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Notification
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Class used to capture the fact the ToFileRunNotifier was called. An instance of this class represents a single call to the notifier. When the tests have completed and the calls to the notifier of each rank have been written to a file, the MpiRunner parses these files and reproduces the calls made to the Junit notifier on its own RunNotifier for each rank, effectively transmitting the test results of rank used to run the tests.
    Author:
    Patrick Finnerty
    See Also:
    ToFileRunNotifier, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • method

        public String method
        Method that was called

      • parameters

        public Object[] parameters
        Parameters that were used when making the call to the notifier.

        In practice, there is always a single parameter in the methods of the notifier. But it is easier to carry the array of objects as it matches the expected format of the Method.invoke(Object, Object...) method used when re-making the calls to the notifier in MpiRunner.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Notification

        public Notification(String m,
                    Object[] params)
        Constructor. Builds a Notification object that represents the fact that a method of the class ToFileRunNotifier was called.
        Parameters:
        m - the name of the method that was called
        params - parameters with which the method was called
